Name: Orange Bloom Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Fruity, zesty, delicately herbal orange laced with gin. Modern bartending convention is to stir rather than shake this "Martini" but it's better shaken, as stipulated by Harry Cradock.
History: Adapted from the following recipe in Harry Cradock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Orange Bloom Martini contains 186 calories
